short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add bank offers and discounts automatically to your account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking to make the most of your bank offers and discounts? Say hello to Offers-O-Matic! Our innovative tool allows you to automatically add all the latest and greatest offers from your bank straight to your account, so you never miss out on a deal. With Offers-O-Matic, you can rest assured that you're getting the best possible savings at all times.

Currently supported banks are American Express and Chase, with many more on the way!
